Title: Polyphony
Writer: Lana Wachowski (created by), J. Michael Straczynski (created by), Lilly Wachowski (created by), Lana Wachowski, J. Michael Straczynski
Actors: Doona Bae, Jamie Clayton, Tina Desai, Tuppence Middleton
Plot: Kala and Capheus are caught in the middle of angry protests. Lito looks into a journalist's disappearance and uncovers new info on Angelica's cluster.
